item.title: Getting started
item.description: Welcome to the Mainroad theme documentation. This quick guide has been written for intermediate and advanced users who are interested in getting started with the Mainroad theme, including installation and minimal configuration. To fully understand the rest of this guide, you need to be familiar with the main concepts of the Hugo static site generator.
